awd_abstract_narration: This equipment will be used for                                                 several research projects, and will                                             aid in the analysis of proteins and                                             organic acids.  The research                                                    projects include light scattering                                               studies on protein folding and                                                  aggregation, effects of downstream                                              processing conditions on protein                                                conformation and enzyme activity                                                changes, and novel separations for                                              protein fractionation and                                                       purification.  Each of these                                                    projects require rapid and accurate                                             analyses of the protein solution or                                             fermentation broth samples.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.inst_name: Ohio State University Research Foundation -DO NOT USE
